channel.title: Easter Event 2008!
channel.description:
Its here the guide can be found [url=http://www.runescape.com/kbase/viewarticle.ws?article_id=657]here[/url]
It seems that the problem-prone Easter Bunny is once again experiencing difficulties. He's spent so much time redecorating his warren that he hasn't noticed critters burrowing in and devouring his entire chocolate stockpile. Now, devoid of cocoa stocks, the chocolate egg production has ground to a halt and the forecast for Easter celebrations looks bleak. No need to worry, though - the Easter Bunny is an inventive sort, and has come up with an eggs-emplary new idea: use a chocatrice! These fearsome creatures, incubated from a chocolate-coated cockatrice egg, can turn their targets into chocolate with one lethal, chocifying gaze. It falls to you, then, to create this curious creature. You'll need to track down some of the lost chocolate to make a chocatrice egg and then carefully incubate it. The critters who ate the chocolate supply are sealed in the Easter Bunny's tunnels and will prove a suitable target for your chocatrice. So, this Easter, you will come to the aid of chocolate lovers everywhere, incubating your own chocatrice, guiding it around the Easter Bunny's tunnels and turning the greedy rats into something altogether more delicious...
If you need to know where the eggs are there are 9: Falador Gem Store Statue of Saradomin Just outside fally Port Sarim, the boat which takes you to Karamja Falador Smelting/furnace Room Upstairs in Falador Party Room Rimmington Mining Spot North of Port Sarim, on a Rock Upstairs in the Wise Old Mans house Statue in Port Sarim, Near the fish shop, where there are Goblins comment :D (on the event...)

item.title: Easter Event 2008!
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Not sure if these eggs are tradeable. I doubt they are, But what would be the point of eggs that you can eat but can’t trade?

Read full topic

I think the reward is quite nice. The animation that comes with the cape is superb. This is really changing it up for nonmembers; the happier nonmembers get, the better the chance they buy membership,

item.title: Easter Event 2008!

item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:1, topic:190555”]Its here the guide can be found here

[quote=runescape.com]It seems that the problem-prone Easter Bunny is once again experiencing difficulties. He’s spent so much time redecorating his warren that he hasn’t noticed critters burrowing in and devouring his entire chocolate stockpile.

Now, devoid of cocoa stocks, the chocolate egg production has ground to a halt and the forecast for Easter celebrations looks bleak. No need to worry, though - the Easter Bunny is an inventive sort, and has come up with an eggs-emplary new idea: use a chocatrice! These fearsome creatures, incubated from a chocolate-coated cockatrice egg, can turn their targets into chocolate with one lethal, chocifying gaze.

It falls to you, then, to create this curious creature. You’ll need to track down some of the lost chocolate to make a chocatrice egg and then carefully incubate it. The critters who ate the chocolate supply are sealed in the Easter Bunny’s tunnels and will prove a suitable target for your chocatrice.

So, this Easter, you will come to the aid of chocolate lovers everywhere, incubating your own chocatrice, guiding it around the Easter Bunny’s tunnels and turning the greedy rats into something altogether more delicious…[/quote]

If you need to know where the eggs are there are 9:

Falador Gem Store
Statue of Saradomin Just outside fally
Port Sarim, the boat which takes you to Karamja
Falador Smelting/furnace Room
Upstairs in Falador Party Room
Rimmington Mining Spot
North of Port Sarim, on a Rock
Upstairs in the Wise Old Mans house
Statue in Port Sarim, Near the fish shop, where there are Goblins

comment (on the event…)[/quote]

Oops I forgot to do this event, I must be doing it soon, since I have missed alot of them. As long it has a decent reward.

item.title: Easter Event 2008!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I logged in just to do this, was all quite simple until jagex decided they would make it so that 50 players had to share one animal to change to chocolate[Where your chocatrice has to attack animals to get chocolate chunks]

So i logged out and am waiting a few days until its a bit more easier to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Event 2008!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Well as tradition, since i played the game i have always done every event. But since i stopped playing all that time ago i still used to buy membership (don’t ask me why) just to go to the events, i bought membership today, went to go do it. Then just like… gave up?

ugh cbf

Read full topic
